EmailTemplate.name: Request a Trial.Marketo Follow-up - Email 4 (Test Data Management with Tosca Tes
EmailTemplate.subject: Test Data Management with Tosca Testsuite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Test Data Management with Tosca Testsuite
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Tosca Testsuite’s Test Data Management helps to manage all of the data needed to be executed during the testing phase. It is seamlessly integrated with the creation and execution of both manual and automated tests, making Tosca Testsuite a comprehensive test management and execution suite. Learn more about our Test Data Management system through these videos:
- Guide <https://documentation.tricentis.com/en/822/index.htm?#tchb/test_data_management.htm%3FTocPath%3DTest%2520data%2520management%7C_____0> to Test Data Management
- Manipulating Objects <https://documentation.tricentis.com/en/822/index.htm?#tchb/manipulating_objects.htm> in Test Data Management
- Using Values <https://documentation.tricentis.com/en/822/index.htm?#tchb/using_tdm_test_data.htm> from the Test Data Management Repository
Hope you’ve found this helpful! More useful tips are headed your way! Best wishes,
The Tricentis Team trial@tricentis.com <mailto:trial@tricents.com>
Product and Licensing For further questions regarding product or licensing, please contact our Tricentis sales team: Website <http://innovate.tricentis.com/talk-with-sales.html>
